```{r setup, include=FALSE}
a <- scan("pg10.txt",what="character",skip=104) ## skip contents
n <- length(a)
a <- a[-((n-2886):n)] ## strip license
a <- a[-grep("[0123456789]:[0123456789]",a)] ## strip out verse numbers
```
